profile_positions.description:
Being increasingly invited to apply findings from behavioral sciences, I started The Center for Applied Product Personality Research (CaPPr). CaPPr wants to capture and amplify the voices of great product personality experts from around the world. CaPPr aims to unlock and apply the potential of product personality research in a great variety of key life areas.
Unlocking and applying product personality research, will make consumers aware of the hidden instincts behind their shopping, spending and decision behavior. This awareness will help them find their true preferences and thus increase their life satisfaction with the products and experiences they purchase.

profile_positions.description:
What makes people feel happy in their homes? It matches their personality. 
This is what Belong is all about. 
Belong enables consumers to sell and buy homes also on the basis of personality in addition to traditional criteria like location, price and type of property.
Easily swiping along various home styles, both sellers and buyers add personality to the profiles of the homes they are selling or are looking for. Service providers like realtors do the same and when they fit, they are recommended to buyers and sellers that already match. Powerful algorithms optimize these processes. Social chat enables instant contact between buyers and sellers. Realtors that match can also be invited to the chat. 
In short: The buyer finds a house that fits like a glove and the seller finds a buyer that truly matches their house.
I co-founded and funded Belong and am active in its daily operation
